metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27782 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: libcurl would reuse a previously created connection even when a TLS orSSHrelated option had been changed that should have prohibitedreuse.libcurl keeps previously used connections in a connection pool forsubsequenttransfers to reuse if one of them matches the setup. However,several TLS andSSH settings were left out from the configuration matchchecks, making themmatch too easily.

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'regressions likely').
